_documentation.overview: Complete item database for DreamWorld game system

category_system.description: Items are organized into multiple categories that define their purpose and availability

category_types.purpose: Items that can be consumed to restore HP or provide other benefits
category_types.notes: Basic healing items, some found in the wild, others purchased from shops
Cannot be discarded, often required to advance the plot or unlock areas

category_types.purpose: Equippable items that provide stat boosts or unlock abilities
category_types.notes: Can be equipped in the EQUIP tab. Some unlock world actions (menu abilities) or combat abilities. Strategic equipment planning is important as certain charms suit specific party members better

category_types.purpose: Equippable weapons that boost stats for specific characters
category_types.notes: Primarily boost hit rating and offensive stats. Each weapon is suited for a particular character

category_types.purpose: Items exclusively available for purchase in shops
category_types.notes: The 'Mug&Muffin' café items - can only be obtained by purchasing from this specific shop

category_types.purpose: Items exclusive to the Lanternfall_Grove_DW (Halloween world)
category_types.notes: Must be used in this specific dream world. Includes disguises and seasonal items

category_types.purpose: Items exclusive to the Black_Space_DW world
category_types.notes: Story-critical items found only in this particular dream world

category_types.purpose: Items exclusive to the Bloom_Island_DW (main world)
category_types.notes: Items that can only be used or are necessary for the main dream world

category_system.category_mixing: Items can belong to multiple categories. For example, an item can be both 'story_important' AND 'charms' (like the Jack-O-Lantern Head which is a story item, charm, and world-exclusive item)

ability_system.description: Charms can unlock two types of abilities

ability_types.description: Skills that can be used during battles
ability_types.example: Giant Toy Hammer unlocks 'Smash' ability for Hikiko in combat

ability_types.description: Actions that appear in the menu and can be used in the overworld
ability_types.example: Ball unlocks 'Throw' action for Hikiko when selected from menu
ability_types.example_2: Memory Book unlocks 'Book' action for Rainy

ability_system.notes: Some charms are purely functional, others are aesthetic, and some are required for story progression (like the Scarf needed to enter snowy areas)

world_requirements.description: Certain areas require specific equipped items to access

examples.consequence: Without it, Rainy will complain about the cold or refuse to proceed

examples.purpose: Disguise to blend in with the Halloween world inhabitants
Illuminate dark areas to navigate safely

item_properties.can_stack: Whether multiple copies can stack in one inventory slot (true/false)
item_properties.max_stack: Maximum number of items that can stack in one slot
item_properties.effects: Gameplay effects when the item is used or equipped
item_properties.categories: Array of category IDs this item belongs to
item_properties.icon_path: Path to the visual icon for the item

consumables_food.name: Consumables
consumables_food.description: Food items that can be consumed for healing or buffs

story_important.name: Important
story_important.description: Story-critical items that cannot be discarded

shop.name: Mug&Muffin
shop.description: Items that can only be purchased from the Mug&Muffin café

world_halloween.name: Lanternfall_Grove_DW
world_halloween.description: Items exclusive to the Halloween dream world

charms.name: Charms
charms.description: Equippable items that boost stats or unlock abilities

weapon_toys.name: Weapon
weapon_toys.description: Equippable weapons that boost combat stats

world_black_space.name: Black_Space_DW
world_black_space.description: Items exclusive to the Black Space dream world

world_main.name: Bloom_Island_DW
world_main.description: Items exclusive to the main Bloom Island dream world

strawberry_wild.name: Wild Strawberry
strawberry_wild.description:
A small strawberry that grew freely without anyone caring for it... yet it thrived anyway.
Its flavor is simple but comforting, like a forgotten memory that suddenly returns.
strawberry_wild.notes: Basic wild consumable, found in nature

mushroom_wild.name: Wild Mushroom
mushroom_wild.description:
A humble mushroom that grows quietly in the shade, unnoticed by most.
Its flavor is mild, but it carries a warmth that feels like sitting by a campfire on a cold night.

hot_cocoa.name: Hot Cocoa
hot_cocoa.description:
A cozy drink made with rich chocolate and just the right amount of sweetness.
The steam smells like winter mornings and quiet moments you wish lasted longer.

strawberry_pie.name: Strawberry Pie
strawberry_pie.description: Baked lovingly by grandma using her old family recipe. Every bite feels like being wrapped in a soft blanket—comforting, nostalgic, and just a little bittersweet. You can almost hear her gentle voice telling you to eat slowly.
strawberry_pie.notes: Story-significant item from grandma, combines consumable and important categories

herbal_tea.name: Sweet Tea
herbal_tea.description: A gentle tea made from hand-picked leaves and flowers. Its aroma is earthy and sweet, like rain drifting through an open window. Drinking it eases tension in the chest and quiets thoughts that won't sit still.
herbal_tea.notes: Mug&Muffin café item with calming properties

skye_cookie.name: Skye's Cookie
skye_cookie.description: A soft cookie baked by Skye. Sweet, crumbly, and full of love.
skye_cookie.notes: Special item from character Skye, story significance

strawberry_smoothie.name: Strawberry Smoothie
strawberry_smoothie.description: A fresh, frosty strawberry smoothie from Mug & Muffin. Blended with love… and tiny cat paws. Its texture is perfectly creamy, and the strawberries are so fresh they almost sparkle. Each cup comes with a tiny paw-print drawn in whipped cream - a signature touch from the staff.

banana_smoothie.name: Banana Smoothie
banana_smoothie.description: A creamy banana smoothie made by the café's fluffiest barista. Thick, smooth, and blended with expert precision by a very round cat who refuses to share his secret technique. The taste is comforting and mellow, like a slow morning where nothing feels rushed.

mango_smoothie.name: Mango Smoothie
mango_smoothie.description: A bright, tropical mango drink that tastes like sunshine in a cup. It's sweet, tangy, and refreshingly cold - perfect for lifting your mood. The color is so vibrant it almost glows.
mango_smoothie.notes: Mug&Muffin café smoothie with mood enhancement

berry_smoothie.name: Berry Smoothie
berry_smoothie.description: A mixed-berry smoothie bursting with flavor and cat-made charm. A blend of strawberries, blueberries, and whatever mysterious berry the cats found behind the café today. Tart but sweet, it tastes like waking up in a garden full of dew-covered fruit. A sleepy barista cat added a swirl of cream "for aesthetics"... then fell asleep on the counter.

melon_smoothie.name: Melon Smoothie
melon_smoothie.description: Blended by the quietest cat in the café, who hums softly while working. The flavor is delicate and airy, like a chilled summer breeze drifting through an empty field. It's so refreshing it almost feels magical.
melon_smoothie.notes: Mug&Muffin café smoothie with refreshing effect

nachos.name: Nachos
nachos.description: Crunchy chips loaded with warm cheese and tiny paw-shaped jalapeños. The chef claims it's "the ultimate comfort snack," right before knocking the tray over… and then salvaging it with pride. A messy, gooey delight that somehow tastes like friendship.

waffle.name: Waffle
waffle.description: Crispy on the outside, soft inside, and topped with a little swirl of berry syrup. A polite barista cat stamps it with a tiny heart imprint before serving. Sweet, warm, and oddly reassuring.

pancake.name: Pancake
pancake.description: Light, fluffy, and drenched in golden syrup collected from "special bees," according to the staff. The top pancake is shaped like a fish - a little joke from the cook. Tastes like a comforting morning.

donut.name: Donut
donut.description: Perfectly soft and dangerously sweet. The frosting is licked smooth (…only on one side) by a naughty kitten who insists it was "quality control." Despite this, it's delightful and full of whimsy.

snow_cone.name: Snow Cone
snow_cone.description: Cold, fluffy ice drenched in a vibrant syrup mixed by the café's alchemist cat. The flavors shift subtly with your emotions - sweet when you're calm, tangy when you're excited. Eating it feels like biting into a tiny rainbow.
snow_cone.notes: Mug&Muffin café item with emotion-based flavor changes

lemonade.name: Lemonade
lemonade.description: Served with ice cubes shaped like tiny fish. The sourness is just right - zippy enough to wake you up but sweet enough to keep you smiling. Popular among cats who claim it "improves meows."

orange_juice.name: Orange Juice
orange_juice.description: The oranges are hand-pressed (paw-pressed?) one by one, resulting in a vibrant, pulpy drink. Tastes like bright mornings and warm sunlight warming your cheeks. Surprisingly energizing.

watermelon_juice.name: Watermelon Juice
watermelon_juice.description: Pink, refreshing, and served in a glass decorated with cat stickers. A lazy barista pours it slowly, humming a tune only cats understand. Perfect for hot days.

pineapple_juice.name: Pineapple Juice
pineapple_juice.description: Made from pineapples supposedly grown "near the moon," according to the café's storyteller cat. Sweet, sharp, and instantly uplifting - like sunshine in liquid form. A favorite among adventurous dreamers.

strawberry_cake.name: Strawberry Cake
strawberry_cake.description: Light, airy layers filled with fresh strawberries. The frosting is thick, creamy, and decorated with tiny paw-print sprinkles. The baker - a dignified older cat - claims this recipe "came to him in a dream… inside another dream."

caramel_apple.name: Caramel Apple
caramel_apple.description: A crisp apple dipped in warm, golden caramel that somehow never sticks to your teeth. The cat who made it insists the caramel is "enchanted" — though he also knocked over three pans in the process. Sweet, nostalgic, and a little bit chaotic… just like the café.

hamburger.name: Hamburger
hamburger.description: Toasted buns, a juicy patty, and crisp lettuce arranged with surgical precision. The chef cat refuses to let anyone touch the plate until he has inspected every detail.

salad.name: Salad
salad.description: A bright mix of greens, tomatoes, crunchy seeds, and a herb dressing. Light, crisp, and surprisingly calming.

candy.name: Candy
candy.description: A small sweet treat collected during the eternal Halloween of Lanternfall Grove. It tastes like caramel and autumn wind - warm, soft, and a little spooky. The wrapper crinkles on its own sometimes… like it's giggling.

bag_candy.name: Big Bag Of Candy
bag_candy.description: A giant sack of assorted candies gathered from wandering spirits and lantern-lit groves. Every piece inside glows with a different color, like tiny souls trying to escape the bag.
bag_candy.notes: Lanternfall Grove world exclusive, large quantity candy

ghost_book.name: Spooky Book
ghost_book.description:
A spectral storybook that once belonged to a lantern spirit.
Its pages flip by themselves, revealing childish drawings of ghosts playing tricks. Reading it makes your fingertips feel cold, but also… brave. Sometimes the book giggles when you touch it.
ghost_book.notes: Lanternfall Grove story item with special properties

flashlight.name: Flashlight
flashlight.description: A small flashlight that cuts through the fog of Lanternfall Grove.
flashlight.notes: Required charm for navigating dark areas in Lanternfall Grove. World-exclusive utility charm

chef_hat.name: Chef's hat
chef_hat.description: A clean, fluffy chef's hat that smells faintly of warm bread. You can use it for cooking like a real chef!
chef_hat.notes: Charm that unlocks cooking ability - functional charm for gameplay mechanics

throw_hikiko.name: Baskteball Ball
throw_hikiko.description: A big, bouncy ball full of childish energy. Hikiko seems especially attached to it.
throw_hikiko.notes: Unlocks 'Throw' world action for Hikiko when equipped. Character-specific charm

scarf.name: Scarf
scarf.description: A soft scarf that keeps you warm, no matter how cold the Dreamworld gets.
scarf.notes: REQUIRED to enter snowy areas. Without it, Rainy refuses to proceed due to cold

paint_brush.name: Paint Brush
paint_brush.description: A well-used brush with worn wood and gentle shimmer on the bristles. The world seems slightly more flexible in its presence like it wants to be repainted!
paint_brush.notes: Charm that allows painting/reality manipulation in certain contexts

backpack.name: Backpack
backpack.description: A sturdy dream-backpack with far more space inside than outside. Ideal for adventurers who collect… everything. You may need it!
backpack.notes: Functional charm that increases inventory capacity

watering_pail.name: Watering Pail
watering_pail.description: A tiny watering pail filled with endlessly fresh water.
watering_pail.notes: Charm for watering plants, likely used for gardening mechanics

strawberries_bunch.name: Cloud's Garden Strawberries
strawberries_bunch.description: Fresh strawberries grown in Cloud's hidden garden. Each berry carries a soft sweetness that lingers on the tongue, along with a faint emotion you can't quite name. Cloud only gives these to people he trusts deeply.
strawberries_bunch.notes: Special story item from Cloud character, indicates trust relationship

grandma_soup.name: Grandma's Soup
grandma_soup.description: A simple, comforting soup made by grandma. The ingredients are nothing extraordinary… vegetables, broth, a few spices. But the warmth feels different — deeper, familiar, like a memory wrapped in steam.
grandma_soup.notes: Important story item from grandma with deep emotional significance

homemade_meal.name: Homemade Meal
homemade_meal.description: A small, carefully arranged meal placed in a simple container. Everything is neatly organized — shaped rice, soft vegetables, a bit of fish with tofu, and a tiny handwritten note tucked underneath the lid.
homemade_meal.notes: Story-important meal with attached note, likely character relationship item

memory_book.name: Memory Book
memory_book.description: An old, hand-bound book containing pieces of the past photos, drawings, ticket stubs, and small notes written in different handwriting.
memory_book.notes: CRITICAL STORY ITEM - Unlocks 'Book' action for Rainy, contains past memories. Obtained at specific story moment

photo_fragment.name: Photo Fragment
photo_fragment.description: A torn piece of a photograph. The edges are frayed, like it's been held too tightly.
photo_fragment.notes: Black Space world exclusive story fragment, collectible pieces of memories

sea_shell.name: Sea Shell
sea_shell.description: A delicate shell with faint pastel colors swirling across its surface. When you listen closely, he hears something more than the usual "ocean sound." The whisper inside is faint, almost like someone trying to speak from far away - gentle, distant, and achingly familiar.
sea_shell.notes: Important story item with mysterious voice/message inside

skye_ribbon.name: Skye's Ribbon
skye_ribbon.description: A soft ribbon that once belonged to Skye. It still carries a faint scent - something gentle, like clean cotton and a warm breeze.
skye_ribbon.notes: Black Space world story item, personal belonging of Skye character

flowers.name: Flowers
flowers.description: A delicate collection of wildflowers chosen with quiet care. The petals are soft and slightly wilted, as if they were picked in a hurry - or with a heavy heart. Each flower carries a different meaning: remembrance, gratitude, apology, hope. You hold the bouquet gently, afraid that even a breath might damage it.
flowers.notes: Black Space world story item with deep symbolic meaning, likely for memorial or reconciliation

sheet_music.name: Sheet Music
sheet_music.description: Old sheet music from the final recital.
sheet_music.notes: Black Space world story item connected to a final recital event

key_black_space.name: Key
key_black_space.description: A simple key that feels heavier than it should.
key_black_space.notes: Black Space world key, heavy with metaphorical significance

flower_crown.name: Flower Crown
flower_crown.description: A handmade flower crown belonging to Cloud.
flower_crown.notes: Black Space world story item, personal belonging of Cloud character

letter.name: Skye's Sister Letter
letter.description: A letter written by Skye's sister. The ink looks smudged in places.
letter.notes: Black Space world critical story letter from Skye's sister, ink smudges suggest tears

rope.name: Rope
rope.description: A sturdy rope with knots tied at uneven intervals.
rope.notes: Black Space world story item, practical use or symbolic significance

jack_o_latern_head.name: Jack-O-Latern Head
jack_o_latern_head.description: A hollow pumpkin with a carved face. Surprisingly comfortable to wear.
jack_o_latern_head.notes: REQUIRED charm for Lanternfall Grove - must wear to blend in/disguise. Multi-category: charm + world exclusive + story important

smash_hikiko.name: Giant Toy Hammer
smash_hikiko.description: A huge, squeaky toy hammer. Loud, colorful, and heavier than it looks.
smash_hikiko.notes: Hikiko's weapon - Unlocks 'Smash' combat ability. Triple category: charm + weapon + story item

hit_jelly.name: Baseball Bat
hit_jelly.description: A sturdy wooden bat that feels good in your hands.
hit_jelly.notes: Jelly's weapon - Unlocks 'Hit' combat ability. Boosts hit rating

train_pass.name: Train Pass
train_pass.description: A small ticket that grants passage through the Bloom Island trains!
train_pass.notes: Bloom Island world exclusive - Required for train travel, consumed on use

ability_definitions._note: Abilities that are unlocked by equipping specific charms

smash.name: Smash
smash.description: Powerful hammer attack that can be used in combat

throw.name: Throw
throw.description: Throw the ball at objects or switches in the world

book.name: Book
book.description: Open the memory book to view past memories and photos

illuminate_darkness.name: Illuminate
illuminate_darkness.description: Use flashlight to illuminate dark areas

cook.name: Cook
cook.description: Enables cooking mechanics when wearing chef's hat

paint.name: Paint
paint.description: Paint or alter reality in specific contexts

world_access_requirements._note: Items required to access or navigate specific areas

snowy_world.reason: Prevents cold damage and Rainy's refusal to proceed

lanternfall_grove_inhabitants.reason: Disguise needed to blend in with Halloween world residents

bloom_island_trains.reason: Ticket required for train travel (consumed on use)
